name: Jupiter
description: Licensed Jupiter electricians providing premier residential and commercial services. From luxury waterfront estates to commercial support near the Jupiter Inlet, Solomon Electric is your trusted choice.

challenges.title: Waterfront Estate Distribution
challenges.description: Jupiter's premier estates on the Loxahatchee River and Inlet require high-capacity electrical systems, specialized multi-panel setups, and advanced marine-grade outdoor lighting.

challenges.title: Jupiter Farms Rural Power
challenges.description: Properties in the Farms often require specialized wiring for large acreages, outbuildings, sophisticated well-pump systems, and robust generator backup readiness.

challenges.title: Storm Surge Resilience
challenges.description: Jupiter's northern coastal location makes it a target for powerful seasonal storms. We emphasize whole-home surge protection and weather-resistant infrastructure.

faqs.question: We have 5 acres in Jupiter Farms—can you handle the whole property?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Jupiter Farms properties often have multiple structures requiring coordinated electrical: main homes, guest houses, workshops, horse barns, and extensive landscape lighting. We design systems with proper sub-panels for each structure, underground runs between buildings, and generators sized to handle the full load when needed. Properties on well water need special consideration for pump backup.

faqs.question: Do you work in Admiral's Cove and other waterfront communities?
faqs.answer: Yes, Jupiter's premier waterfront estates are a significant part of our luxury residential work. Admiral's Cove, The Bluffs, and Loxahatchee River properties require high-capacity electrical systems (often 400+ amps), marine-grade outdoor components, dock and seawall power, and integration with sophisticated automation systems. We understand the quality expectations in these communities.

faqs.question: What's involved in installing dock power on the Loxahatchee River?
faqs.answer: Loxahatchee waterfront properties need dock electrical that meets NEC Article 555 marina safety requirements. We install properly rated dock pedestals, shore power connections, boat lift circuits, underwater lighting, and all with GFCI protection and corrosion-resistant components. Salt exposure is less intense than oceanfront, but proper materials still matter for longevity.

faqs.question: Do you serve businesses in Abacoa Town Center?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide commercial electrical services in Abacoa and throughout Jupiter's business areas. Services include tenant buildouts, restaurant electrical, retail lighting, and 24/7 emergency response. We understand that Jupiter businesses have high standards and can't afford extended electrical downtime.

faqs.question: Jupiter Farms has frequent power outages—should we install a generator?
faqs.answer: Generator installation is very common for Jupiter Farms properties. The area's rural nature and extensive tree cover mean outages happen more frequently and last longer than in urban areas. For properties on well water, generators are nearly essential—when power goes out, so does your water. We size generators to handle well pumps, AC, and essential circuits.

faqs.question: How quickly can you respond to emergencies in Jupiter?
faqs.answer: We provide electrical services to the Jupiter area as part of our northern Palm Beach County coverage. For urgent requirements, we allocate technical resources based on the specific safety needs of the property.

seoContent.heading: Premier Jupiter Electricians – Uniquely Professional
seoContent.body: Jupiter is a town like no other, balancing beautiful natural waterways with a sophisticated lifestyle. From the historic lighthouse to the vibrant Abacoa community, it's a place that values quality and durability. Solomon Electric is proud to provide the licensed expertise that Jupiter's homeowners and businesses count on. Our electricians are dispatched from strategic locations across Palm Beach County, often arriving within 60 minutes. We maintain full parts inventory on every truck, so most repairs and installations are completed in a single visit.

seoContent.heading: Expert Electrical Solutions for Jupiter Properties
seoContent.body: Whether your Jupiter property needs panel upgrades, modern lighting, EV charging, or emergency repairs, our licensed electricians deliver solutions built for Palm Beach County's building codes and South Florida's demanding climate. We handle all permitting and inspections so you don't have to. Every project in Jupiter is handled by W-2 employees—never subcontractors. Our electricians are drug-tested, background-checked, and carry our $2M liability insurance. We treat your home with the same care and respect we'd want in our own.

seoContent.heading: Serving Every Neighborhood in Jupiter
seoContent.body: From Abacoa, Jupiter Farms, The Bluffs to Evergrene, our electricians provide full-service coverage throughout Jupiter. We understand the specific electrical characteristics of each area — from older homes that need rewiring to new construction requiring modern smart home systems. Jupiter properties face unique electrical challenges from South Florida's heat, humidity, and storm exposure. We use marine-grade hardware, UV-resistant conduit, and corrosion-resistant components that last in this environment.

seoContent.heading: Reliable Electrical Care for the Jupiter Community
seoContent.body: Whether you're modernizing a beach house in The Bluffs, upgrading a professional office in Abacoa Town Center, or needing storm-ready protection in Jupiter Farms, our team is ready to serve. we provide professional service, clean workmanship, and a dedication to safety that has been our hallmark for 18 years. From routine outlet installations to complex rewiring projects, we handle all aspects of residential and commercial electrical work in Jupiter. Every job includes upfront pricing, clean worksite practices, and a satisfaction guarantee.
